languages.text: {n}Андровета-Фи косится на Джиневри.{/n} "Хорошо, я нарушу покой духа, но пусть мирянка держится с почтением и не перечит мне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Андровета-Фи косится на Джиневри.{/n} "Хорошо, я нарушу покой духа, но пусть мирянка держится с почтением и не перечит мне!"

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
languages.original_text: {n}Андровета-Фи косится на Джиневри.{/n} "Хорошо, я нарушу покой духа, но пусть мирянка держится с почтением и не перечит мне!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
{n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
{n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevra a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
{n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevra a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
{n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
{n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi jette un regard en coin à Jinevri.{/n} « Très bien. J'accepte de contacter l'esprit, mais à la condition expresse que la profane lui montre le respect qui lui est dû et suive mes instructions à la lettre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi jette un regard en coin à Jinevra.{/n} « Très bien. J'accepte de contacter l'esprit, mais à la condition expresse que la profane lui montre le respect qui lui est dû et suive mes instructions à la lettre ! »

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Fi mira de reojo a Jinevri.{/n} «Que así sea. Perturbaré al espíritu, ¡pero exijo que la laica muestre respeto y haga lo que le digo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi mira de reojo a Jinevra.{/n} «Que así sea. Perturbaré al espíritu, ¡pero exijo que la laica muestre respeto y haga lo que le digo!».

languages.text: {n}安多维塔-菲瞥了杰尼娃一眼。{/n}“很好，那就由我来打扰机魂吧，但我要求那个教外人士心怀敬意，按我吩咐的去做！”
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

traits.locale_text: {n}安多维塔-菲瞥了杰尼娃一眼。{/n}“很好，那就由我来打扰机魂吧，但我要求那个教外人士充满敬意，按我吩咐的去做！”

languages.text: {n}アンドロヴェータ・ファイはジネヴリを横目で見た。{/n}「よろしい。私は精霊の邪魔をする。素人の女性は敬意を示し、言われた通りにすることを要求する！」
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アンドロヴェータ・ファイはジネブラを横目で見た。{/n} 「よろしい。私は霊の邪魔をする。素人の女性は敬意を示し、言われた通りにすることを要求する！」

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phi blickt Jinevri von der Seite an.{/n} "Nun gut. Ich werde den Geist stören, aber ich verlange, dass mir die Laiin Respekt zollt und tut, was man ihr sagt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Androveta-Phi blickt Jinevra von der Seite her an.{/n} "Nun gut. Ich werde den Geist stören, doch ich verlange, dass die Laiin Respekt zeigt und tut, was man ihr sagt!"

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Fi, Jinevri'ye gözünün ucuyla bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Ruhu rahatsız edeceğim. Lakin avam kadınının hürmet göstermesini ve kendisine söyleneni yapmasını talep ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi shoots Jinevri a sidelong glance.{/n} "Very well. I shall disturb the spirit, but I demand that the laywoman show respect and do as she is told!"
